news.image_caption: ThreeFold Tech recognized by Deloitte Belgium
news.content:
Congratulations to ThreeFold Tech üëè which was recognized as one of 10 finalists by Deloitte Belgium in its Rising Star competition. ThreeFold Tech is responsible for the technology behind the ThreeFold Grid.

Deloitte will announce the winner on 26 November 2020. ü§û You can read more about the news here.
news.excerpt: Congratulations to ThreeFold Tech, which was recognized as one of 10 finalists by Deloitte Belgium in its Rising Star competition! More within.

previous.title: ThreeFold Now Marketplace is coming soon!
previous.excerpt: ThreeFold Now Marketplace is a peer-to-peer alternative to centralized cloud providers, enabling you to deploy independently and keep ownership of your own data. üôå Read more within.

next.title: ThreeFold participating @ Global Reset!
next.excerpt: ThreeFold is proud to be supporting and attending the Global Reset Summit taking place this weekend, December 5 & 6.
